name: rightscale Chef cookbook
readme:
RightScale Cookbook
===================

This cookbooks provides configuration management for nodes run on Rightscale.

## Requirements

### Chef

* Chef: 0.10.10+

### RightScale

Most of the recipes need to be run on a RightScale-managed cloud instance aka RightScale Server. You may find some recipes useful for other environments.

### Cookbooks

Depends on the following coookbooks

* collectd (for RightScale Monitoring)
* rest_connection (yet to be used)

See the `metadata.rb` file for the latest dependencies.

## Platforms

The following platforms and versions are tested.

* Debian 7, 6
* Ubuntu 12.04, 10.04

The following platform families are supported in the code, and are
assumed to work based on the successful testing on Ubuntu and CentOS.

* CentOS 6, 5
* EL/RHEL 6, 5
* Fedora

## Recipes

### default

Includes the following recipes as a base (recommended) state for RightScale-managed nodes:

* enforce_path_sanity
* add_sandbox_to_path (disabled by default)
* connect
* server_tags
* monitoring
* tools

### add_sandbox_to_path

Adds the RightLink sandbox to PATH in the Chef run.

### add_tags

Adds an array of RightScale tags by node attribute.

### connect

Connects the node to RightScale via token (applicable only to Blue Skies)

### enforce_path_sanity

Earlier versions of RightLink (< 5.9) do not employ 'path sanity'. This recipe adds common binary locations to PATH that some cookbooks will use.

### install_rightlink

Installs RightScale RightLink (applicable only to nodes that run another Chef).

### list_tags

Lists the current RightScale tags set on the instance.

### monitoring

Sets-up RightScale Monitoring with collectd and the server's allocated Sketchy host.

### remove_tags

Removes an array of RightScale tags by node attribute.

### server_tags

Adds recommended core RightScale tags to the server.

### standardize_chef_version

Patches the RightLink version of Chef to comply to GNU versioning scheme.

### tools

Installs RightScale Tools (awaiting gem release before can be possible).

chef_recipes.rightscale::default: Sets up RightScale Monitoring, installs RightScale Tools and adds RightScale Server tags.
chef_recipes.rightscale::monitoring: Sets up and configures RightScale Monitoring (collectd).
chef_recipes.rightscale::add_sandbox_to_path: Adds the RightLink sandbox to PATH within the environment of the Chef run.
chef_recipes.rightscale::enforce_path_sanity: Enforces Chef 'PATH sanity' within the enironment of the Chef run.
chef_recipes.rightscale::standardize_chef_version: Fix Chef version to standard GNU versioning instead of RightScale fork.
chef_recipes.rightscale::connect: Connect the host to RightScale via BlueSkies.

rightscale/enforce_path_sanity.description: Whether to enforce Chef 'PATH sanity' by modifying ENV['PATH'].

rightscale/add_sandbox_to_path.display_name: RightScale Chef Add Sandbox to PATH
rightscale/add_sandbox_to_path.description: Whether to add the right_link sandbox to ENV['PATH'].

rightscale/data_request_url.description: Connects the node to a RightScale server.

rightscale/tags/add.description: An array of RightScale tags to add to the node.

rightscale/tags/remove.description: An array of RightScale tags to remove from the node.

rightscale/monitoring/collectd_plugins.description: An array of collectd plugins to enable.

collectd/read_threads.description: The collectd read threads setting value.

collectd/servers.description: The collectd servers to send to as a client.
